section.title: Make tree unselectable
section.para: Sometimes people want tree nodes to be unselectable, sometimes selection is a good way to copy (part of) content from the node.
To make tree (or its elements) unselectable use dojo.html.disableSelection in nodeCreate and treeCreate hooks. Apply disableSelection to every node you want to make unselectable.

section.title: Add custom properties to tree
section.para: There is an "objectId" property and "object" property ready to be filled in from markup or program-way.
